name: Brionac [2]
description: A spear with holy attributes. The blades with several rakes. When the weapon is used, the rakes will be automatically shot out to attack the enemy.

name: Brionac [3]
description: A spear with holy attributes. The blades with several rakes. When the weapon is used, the rakes will be automatically shot out to attack the enemy.

name: Broken Blade
description: The whole knife is black with a completely opaque blade. Although there is only a part of the knife left now, the knife handle can't be seen. However, it is still as sharp as ever. It can cut iron as if it were mud. Being a very rare item, it can be used as equipment or to make high-end headwear.

name: Brooch
description: Ornaments that can be decorated on clothes and cloth. User will feel confident after wearing it, and always feels energetic!

name: Brooch [1]
description: Ornaments that can be decorated on clothes and cloth. User will feel confident after wearing it, and always feels energetic!

name: Brown Dyestuffs
description: A magic potion to dye the hair mocha.

name: Bubble Feelings
description: The proud work of conch inventor Thomas. He turned his own model into a sensor. When he puts it on, he can feel the activities of all underwater creatures. Bubbles pop up when he uses it, which are often mistaken for small fish.

name: Buckler
description: A circular shield that is easy and widely used.

name: Buckler [1]
description: A shield that can resist enemy's attack.

name: Bunny Band
description: Rabbit Ear Band

name: Bunny Band [1]
description: Rabbit Ear Band

name: Bunny Band [1] Blueprint
description: Rabbit Ear Band

name: Bunny Egg Backpack
description: A pack full of Easter spirit, with colors overflowing with the joy of early spring. "Don't break the eggs, or the rabbit will slip away!"

name: Bunny Egg Backpack Blueprints
description: A pack full of Easter spirit, with colors overflowing with the joy of early spring. "Don't break the eggs, or the rabbit will slip away!"

name: Bunny Headphone [1]
description: The lovely bunny ear headphone is the most favorite one of young ladies. "Hey! Don't touch my ear! I am listening to the music"

name: Bunny Slipper
description: I feel like I like a rabbit after I put it on.
effect: Move Spd ＋8%,[Life Magic Book IV] ＋[Bunny Slipper]: Cooldown of all skills shortens by 5%

name: Bunny Top Hat
description: Rabbit ear hat that matches well with magic performance.
